thread.title: WATCH: Louisville fan arrested for storming onto floor and busting up Miami huddle
thread.title_full: WATCH: Louisville fan arrested for storming onto floor and busting up Miami huddle

author: Kyle Boone
title: WATCH: Louisville fan arrested for storming onto floor and busting up Miami huddle
text:
10m ago • 1 min read 
One Louisville fan's attempt to pilfer some inside information from the Miami team huddle on Saturday did not go as planned. 
The unnamed fan, who burst onto the court during a timeout and made his way into the Hurricanes' huddle, was arrested and removed from the premises. He was charged with fourth-degree assault, disorderly conduct, terroristic threatening and trespassing. Video of fan being removed from court pic.twitter.com/Rnb6YyeUzB — Lou Sports Network (@CardsRadio) February 11, 2017 
The commotion when the Louisville fan burst on the floor apparently piqued the interest of Miami coach Jim Larranaga, too. And not because he was interested in what was going on outside his team huddle. 
"There was a little bit of a commotion in our huddle," Larranaga said, via the Louisville Courier-Journal . "I glanced up, and there was someone there in our huddle, I believe in red. We don't normally wear red." 
Authorities got to him pretty quickly, so it's highly unlikely he was able to get whatever information he was apparently so desperately seeking from Miami. He'll be pleased to know his team won, 71-66. But he might have to learn that delightful bit of news from a jail cell because of this stunt. Add a comment
